body.p:
Using the Main Files support in includes the following benefits:
When the main file is validated, automatically identifies the modules included in the main file and validates all of them.
When the main file is transformed, automatically identifies the modules included in the main file and transforms them accordingly.
The Content Completion Assistant presents all the components that are collected from the main files for the modules they include.
The Outline view displays all the components that are defined in the main files hierarchy.
The main files that are defined for the current module determines the scope of the search and refactoring actions. performs the search and refactoring actions in the context that the main files determine, thus improving the speed of execution.
